Description: A string of tiny green glazed steatite short cylinder beads, a single cylinder of bird's leg-bone and twelve tiny 'Conus' shells.
Curator's comments: Also form this burial: beads (1930,0711.116 and 1930,0711.117) and shells (1930,0711.118). Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), 74; Grave register, pl. XXXI.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (85)
